"Protect the Lillipans!":
"Oh no! It's blown up...
One of them's come back, but...
Where's the other one...?"

"Seems like it's looking for someone.
Let's help!"

"I wonder if it knows where its
friends are? You should keep up
with it."

"/face2 It's so cute...
Ah, n-no, it's nothing!"

"Yeah... their bodies aren't quite
suited for this planet. I wonder how
they manage to live here."

"/face2 It's so fluffy, isn't it?
Er, n-no, never mind what I said!"

"/face2 It seems to have joined up
with the others! Great work!"

"/face4 Oh... it ran away.
That's that, unfortunately."
